Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $10000 by you. Considering its high quality and unique features, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $9500. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product that is worth more than what you're paying, ensuring great value for your investment. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to serve you with our top-tier service. Should you have any questions or require further details, please don't hesitate to reach out. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
